about_the_game:
Installation:

After installed, the DLC will be downloaded in your local folder.
Check the game library, right click "The Other: Airi's Adventure", click "properties" and find the "local files".
It's in the folder "Airi's Adventure Art Book EN".

☆ ☆ ☆
This Art Book includes everything about "Airi's Adventure" and its development.
It is an A4 sized ebook (a pdf file) with about 100 pages (50 double pages). In this art book you will find:

Detailed information about the characters, environments and the whole story

Doodles and sketches during the development

New illustrations

Comments from the developer


Thank you for supporting this project!

name: Airi's Adventure Art Book

subs.option_text: The Other: Airi's Adventure Artbook - $3.99 $2.39 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Inter Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: The Art Book of The Other: Airi's Adventure, includes everything about the story and its development.
